subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|映日果|いちじく}}, {{ja-r|映%日%果|えい%じつ%か}}: [[fig]]
* {{ja-r|無花果|いちじく}}, {{ja-r|無%花%果|む%か%か}}: [[fig]]
* {{ja-r|無花果%果|いちじく%か}}: [[syconium]]
* {{ja-r|果%敢|か%かん}}: resolute, determined
* {{ja-r|果%実|か%じつ}}: fruit, berry
* {{ja-r|果%樹|か%じゅ}}: fruit tree
* {{ja-r|果%汁|か%じゅう}}: fruit juice
* {{ja-r|果%糖|か%とう}}: fruit sugar
* {{ja-r|果%肉|か%にく}}: flesh of fruit
* {{ja-r|果%報|か%ほう}}: good fortune
* {{ja-r|果%物|くだ%もの}}: fruit
* {{ja-r|青%果|せい%か}}: vegetables and fruits
* {{ja-r|摘%果|てき%か}}: thinning out superfluous fruit
* {{ja-r|結%果|けっ%か}}: result, outcome
* {{ja-r|成%果|せい%か}}: result, fruit
* {{ja-r|効%果|こう%か}}: effect, result
* {{ja-r|因%果|いん%が}}: karma
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|戦%果|せん%か}}: fruit of battle
* {{ja-r|果たす|はたす}}: effect, realize
* {{ja-r|使%命を果たす|し%めい を はたす}}: carry out one's mission
* {{ja-r|果たして|はたして}}: as was expected
* {{ja-r|使い果たす|つかいはたす}}: use up, squander
* {{ja-r|果てる|はてる}}: end, be finished
* {{ja-r|朽ち果てる|くちはてる}}: decay completely
* {{ja-r|絶え果てる|たえはてる}}: be extinguished
* {{ja-r|果て|はて}}: end, extremity
* {{ja-r|果てしない|はてしない}}: endless, boundless
* {{ja-r|苹%果|へい%か}}, {{ja-r|苹%果|ひょう%か}}: [[apple]] (fruit)
{{der-bottom}}

{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{ja-kanjitab|か|yomi=o}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|か|hhira=くわ}}

# [[fruit]]
# {{lb|ja|Buddhism|sort=か}} [[phala]], attained state, [[result]]
# {{lb|ja|Buddhism|sort=か}} [[enlightenment]] (as the fruits of one's Buddhist practice)

subSections.title: See also
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|因|いん}}: cause, factor
* {{ja-r|悟り|さとり}}: Buddhist enlightenment
